00018 #ifndef COORDINATE_H
00019 #define COORDINATE_H
00020 
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00030 class Coordinate {
00031 protected:
00032         double x, y;
00033         
00034 public:
00037         Coordinate();
00042         Coordinate(double x, double y);
00045         ~Coordinate();
00046         
00051         void setX(double x) { this->x = x; }
00056         void setY(double y) { this->y = y; }
00060         double getX() { return x; }
00064         double getY() { return y; }
00065         
00070         double distance(Coordinate *c) {
00071                 double dx = getX()-c->getX();
00072                 double dy = getY()-c->getY();
00073                 return sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);
00074         }
00075         
00080         void write(std::ostream &stream) const;
00081 };
00082         
00083 inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Coordinate & c) {
00084         c.write(stream);
00085         return stream;
00086 }

00088 #endif
